AI Description: BLAST+ (Basic Local Alignment Search Tool) is a suite of command-line tools for nucleotide and protein sequence similarity searches. It is widely used for comparing query sequences against a database of sequences to identify homologous sequences and infer functional and evolutionary relationships.
Core Features: Nucleotide & Protein Sequence Similarity Searches, Identification Of Homologous Sequences, Functional & Evolutionary Relationship Inference, Command-Line Interface For Flexible & Customized Searches, Various Search Algorithms Including Blastn, Blastp, Blastx, & Others, Support For Large Sequence Databases, Statistical Significance Evaluation Of Search Results
General Tags: Sequence Analysis, Bioinformatics, Sequence Similarity, Homology, Evolutionary Relationships
